metadata.name: Azure New CloudShell Created
metadata.comment: Identifies when a new cloudshell is created inside of Azure portal.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM entity_management WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND lower(api.operation) = lower('microsoft.portal/consoles/write'))

output.summary: Identifies when a new cloudshell is created inside of Azure portal.

metadata.objective: False positive: A new cloudshell may be created by a system administrator. Reference: https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/role-based-access-control/resource-provider-operations
